## Set-up

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(brms)

sim_data <- readRDS("sim_data.rds")

sim_data <- sim_data |> 
  mutate(
    sv = as.factor(paste0(v, ".", s))
  )
```

## BM 1 with indexing

```{r}
bm_1_priors <- get_prior(
  dv ~ 0 + sv + (0 + sv | subj),
  data = sim_data
)

bm_1 <- brm(
  dv ~ 0 + sv + (0 + sv | subj),
  data = sim_data,
  cores = 4,
  backend = "cmdstanr"
)

bm_1
```

```{r}
conditional_effects(bm_1)
```

## BM2 with contrasts

```{r}
bm_2 <- brm(
  dv ~ s*v + (s*v | subj),
  data = sim_data,
  cores = 4,
  backend = "cmdstanr"
)
bm_2
```

```{r}
conditional_effects(bm_2, "v:s")
```

## BM1-NL

```{r}
bm_1_nl_bf <- bf(
    dv ~ 0 + a,
    a ~ 0 + sv + (0 + sv |p| subj),
    nl = TRUE
  )

bm_1_nl_priors_default <- get_prior(
  bm_1_nl_bf,
  data = sim_data
)

bm_1_nl_priors <- bm_1_nl_priors_default |> 
  mutate(
    prior = ifelse(prior == "" & class == "b" & coef != "", "normal(0, 5)", prior)
  )


bm_1_nl <- brm(
  bm_1_nl_bf,
  data = sim_data,
  prior = bm_1_nl_priors,
  chains = 1,
  backend = "cmdstanr"
)

bm_1_nl
conditional_effects(bm_1_nl, "sv")
```

```{r}
ranef(bm_1_nl)
```
